ProductInfo.Features:
720p HD Recording up to 16 hours with a 32gb micro-sd card (16gb micro-sd card included for 8 hours of HD recording)
Infrared night mode to record in the dark using 940nm bulbs. These are invisible to the human eye. No red will show from the unit.
With motion activation capability the unit will only record only when movement is detected
View video by hooking up to your TV, or remove the micro-sd card to view or archive video
ProductInfo.Name: SmartCam940 Covert DVR Recording System with Built-in Color Pinhole Surveillance Camera Hidden in a Motion Sensor and Night Vision
